title: Cart
loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to use the cart.
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected items?
confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all items from the cart?
excludePurchased: Proceeding with purchase excluding already purchased items.
purchaseCheckError: An error occurred while checking purchase history.
bankTransferCreated: Bank transfer account has been created.
paymentWindowOpen: Payment window will open. Please complete the payment.
paymentError: An error occurred during payment processing.
emptyDescription: There are no items in your cart.

console.cartUpdateAfterPaymentError: Failed to update cart after payment.
console.cartUpdateAfterPurchaseError: Failed to update cart after purchase.
